languages.text: "Всех, кто позволил себе еретическое высказывание о Вольном Торговце — на принудительную сервиторизацию. Машины не склонны к инакомыслию".

traits.locale_text: "Всех, кто позволил себе еретическое высказывание о Вольном Торговце — на принудительную сервиторизацию. Машины не склонны к инакомыслию".

languages.text: "I sentence all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."
languages.original_text: "Всех, кто позволил себе еретическое высказывание о Вольном Торговце — на принудительную сервиторизацию. Машины не склонны к инакомыслию".

traits.locale_text: "Subject all who have allowed themselves heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."
"Subject all who have allowed themselves heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."
"Subject all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."
"Subject all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."
"Subject all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."

languages.text: “如果有谁敢对行商浪人发表异端言论，就把他们全都改造成机仆。机器是不会造谣生事的。”
languages.original_text: "I sentence all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."

traits.locale_text: “如果有谁敢对行商浪人发表异端言论，就把他们全都改造成机仆。机器是不会造谣生事的。”
“如果有谁敢对行商浪人发表异端言论，就把他们全都变成机仆吧。机器是不会造谣生事的。”

languages.text: «Condeno a todos los que han soltado herejías sobre su Comerciante Independiente a la Servidumbre Imperpituis. Las máquinas son inmunes a la disidencia».
languages.original_text: "I sentence all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."

traits.locale_text: «Condeno a todos los que han soltado herejías sobre su Comerciante Independiente a la Servidumbre Imperpituis. Las máquinas son inmunes a la disidencia».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者について異端的な発言をした者は、すべて不眠奉仕の刑に処するように。機械は異論を唱えるものではない」
languages.original_text: "I sentence all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者について異端的な発言をした者は、すべて不眠奉仕の刑に処するように。機械は異論を唱えるものではない」
「自由開拓者について異端的な発言をした者は、すべて不眠奉仕の刑に処するように。機械は異論を唱えるものではない」

languages.text: "Ich verurteile alle, die es gewagt haben, ketzerische Anmerkungen über {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu machen, zu Servitut Imperpituis. Maschinen begehren nicht auf."
languages.original_text: "I sentence all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verurteile alle, die es gewagt haben, ketzerische Anmerkungen über {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu machen, zu Servitut Imperpituis. Maschinen begehren nicht auf."
"Alle, die es gewagt haben, ketzerische Anmerkungen über {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu machen, kommen in Servitut Imperpituis. Maschinen begehren nicht auf."

languages.text: « Je condamne tous ceux qui ont osé porter de telles accusations hérétiques envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à la Servitude Imperpituis. Les machines ne sont pas enclines à faire preuve de dissidence. »
languages.original_text: "I sentence all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."

traits.locale_text: « Je condamne tous ceux qui ont osé porter de telles accusations hérétiques envers {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à la Servitude Imperpituis. Les machines ne sont pas enclines à faire preuve de dissidence. »

languages.text: "Hür Tacir hakkında kâfirce yorumlarda bulunmaya cüret eden herkes, Müebbet Hizmet'e mahkûm ediyorum. Makineler fikir ayrılığına eğilimli değildir."
languages.original_text: "I sentence all who have dared to make heretical remarks about the Rogue Trader to Servitude Imperpituis. Machines aren't prone to dissidence."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir hakkında kâfirce yorumlarda bulunmaya cüret eden herkes, Müebbet Hizmet'e mahkûm ediyorum. Makineler fikir ayrılığına eğilimli değildir."
